summary: Provides a MXNet‑based graph attention convolution layer for DGL, aggregating neighbor features with learnable attention coefficients. Supports multi‑head attention, feature and attention dropout, residual connections, optional activation, and configurable handling of zero‑in‑degree nodes, applicable to both homogeneous and unidirectional bipartite graphs.
business_intent: Allows developers to incorporate attention‑driven graph convolution operations into MXNet deep‑learning pipelines, facilitating the construction of advanced graph neural network models for tasks such as node classification, link prediction, and graph representation learning.
